Text: Forbes Daily Microsofts Visionary SettlementForbescom Nov Forbescom Where the Internet gets down to business ONLINE TODAY AT FORBESCOM Microsofts Visionary Settlement Maxtor Drives Hard Government By Tax Credit Cashing In On Harry Potters Magic FedEx Has Guts ADVERTISEMENT WSA helps executives introduce their talent to the right companies at the right time In each of the last two years WSA has distributed over million resumes for more than executives Utilize our database of million companies for your job search Serious K Executives use WSA to comprehensively market their job talents httpwwwwsacorpcomindexaspfbsnlttrtxt MICROSOFTS VISIONARY SETTLEMENT Microsoft settles some dubious claims in a way it calls visionary but which looks opportunistic forbessbctcgisid MAXTOR DRIVES HARD Five years ago it was an industry laggard Now it leads the PC hard drive market forbessbctcgisid GOVERNMENT BY TAX CREDIT Install a solarheated spa Hire an excon Maybe even go on vacation Then claim a tax credit forbessbctcgisid CASHING IN ON HARRY POTTERS MAGIC The Harry Potter merchandising onslaught is underway Several firms are hoping for some financial alchemy forbessbctcgisid FEDEX HAS GUTS FedExs rate hikes may not help the bottom line but they prove the business is in good hands forbessbctcgisid HOW TO SUBSCRIBE UNSUBSCRIBE To SUBSCRIBE to any FORBESCOM newsletter join us as a member at forbessbctcgisid UNSUBSCRIBING FROM A NEWSLETTER Forbescom members who selected newsletters when they signed up or on their edit profile page can unsubscribe at forbessbctcgisid If you are not a member or did not select newsletters on our membership pages you can UNSUBSCRIBE to this newsletter by simply replying to this message and changing the messages subject heading to Unsubscribe To MANAGE all your Forbescom newsletter accounts or change your delivery address join us as a member at forbessbctcgisid
